sig_info: Ruptures have 7.5 to 60% chance to not be consumed when a Burst of Physical Damage triggers.
+5 to 20% Combat Power Rate while the Opponent is affected by a Wither Debuff.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Spider-Man 2099 cannot gain Buffs, whenever he would gain a Buff he instead pauses his personal Debuffs for 5 second(s). Personal Stun Debuffs cannot be paused.
While Dodging backward, Spider-Man 2099 is not struck by attacks. Dodging an attack this way triggers his Debuff pausing ability.
Gain 75% Damage Resistance if the Opponent is under the effect of True Strike or if the hit deals True Damage.
RUPTURE - 20 STACKS: Light and Medium attacks have 25% chance to inflict Rupture, dealing 18.2 Physical Damage over 10 second(s). 100% chance to inflict Rupture on a block if the Opponent is suffering from a Wither Debuff.
An Opponent takes a Burst of 27.3 Physical Damage for each Rupture on them if they reach zero power or when they gain a bar of Power. Ruptures are consumed after this effect takes place.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Inflict an Exhaustion Debuff, decreasing Critical Damage Rating by 46.6 and the potency of their Power Gain effects by 15% for 15 second(s). Max 5 stacks.
RESISTANCE UP - MAX 100 STACKS: When attacked there is a 100% chance to gain an indefinite Resistance Up Passive, increasing Physical Resistance and Energy Resistance by 66.67.

Interrupting Spider-Man 2099 while he is charging a Heavy Attack removes all Resistance Up stacks. If at least 20 stacks were removed this way, he inflicts a Wither Debuff with a potency of 125% for 20 second(s).
When Spider-Man 2099 pauses his personal Debuffs, he consumes 5 stacks of Resistance Up and increases the pause duration by 5 second(s). This effect has a 10 second(s) cooldown.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Last three hits have 100% chance to inflict Physical Vulnerability Debuff, decreasing Physical Resistance by 177.78 for 15 second(s). Max 15 stacks
On activation gain 15 stacks of Resistance Up Passive, increasing Physical Resistance and Energy Resistance by 66.67.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: On activation inflicts a Wither Debuff with a potency of 125% for 15 second(s). Max 5 stacks.
Each hit deals a Burst of 34.13 Physical Damage per Unique Debuff on the Opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Stun Debuff for 4 second(s).
Inflict a Slow Debuff, lasting 25 second(s). Slow counts as 4 Unique Debuffs.

RUPTURE - 20 STACKS: Light and Medium attacks have 25% chance to inflict Rupture, dealing 198.8 Physical Damage over 10 second(s). 100% chance to inflict Rupture on a block if the Opponent is suffering from a Wither Debuff.
An Opponent takes a Burst of 298.2 Physical Damage for each Rupture on them if they reach zero power or when they gain a bar of Power. Ruptures are consumed after this effect takes place.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Inflict an Exhaustion Debuff, decreasing Critical Damage Rating by 56.8 and the potency of their Power Gain effects by 15% for 15 second(s). Max 5 stacks.
RESISTANCE UP - MAX 100 STACKS: When attacked there is a 100% chance to gain an indefinite Resistance Up Passive, increasing Physical Resistance and Energy Resistance by 81.25.

Interrupting Spider-Man 2099 while he is charging a Heavy Attack removes all Resistance Up stacks. If at least 20 stacks were removed this way, he inflicts a Wither Debuff with a potency of 125% for 20 second(s).
When Spider-Man 2099 pauses his personal Debuffs, he consumes 5 stacks of Resistance Up and increases the pause duration by 5 second(s). This effect has a 10 second(s) cooldown.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Last three hits have 100% chance to inflict Physical Vulnerability Debuff, decreasing Physical Resistance by 216.67 for 15 second(s). Max 15 stacks
On activation gain 15 stacks of Resistance Up Passive, increasing Physical Resistance and Energy Resistance by 81.25.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: On activation inflicts a Wither Debuff with a potency of 125% for 15 second(s). Max 5 stacks.
Each hit deals a Burst of 372.75 Physical Damage per Unique Debuff on the Opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Stun Debuff for 4 second(s).
Inflict a Slow Debuff, lasting 25 second(s). Slow counts as 4 Unique Debuffs.
